name: R new type remake
description:
Hello everyone!

This is a project I have created for my object orientated programming during my HND year of college. 

I really enjoyed this game as I have made all the art for it myself as well as it was my first introduction with OOP programming techniques. 

Really enjoyed making this game as I always loved playing the classics. 

One thing I do need to go back and add is a pause menu button so you can quit  the game there is no way to do that now except by pressing Alt+f4.

Hope you have some fun with it. I collaborated with Callum a student from the royal conservatoire for the music so please check his website as well if you finish the game his link will be there.

Controls:

W - Up

S- Down

A - Left

D - Right

Left mouse button  - to shoot.
